course_title: Master of Technology Computer Science and Engineering
syllabus_link: https://christuniversity.in/School of Engineering and Technology/COMPUTER SCIENCE AND ENGINEERING/Master of Technology in Computer Science and Engineering/syllabusstructure/5674481/2024
course_structure_link: https://christuniversity.in/School of Engineering and Technology/COMPUTER SCIENCE AND ENGINEERING/Master of Technology in Computer Science and Engineering/syllabusstructure/5674481/2024

fee_structure.time_of_payment: Within seven days of declaration of the Selection Process Result

why_choose: Why choose this course? Dedicated laboratories for research  in computer science and engineering Industry 4.0 Curriculum to match with recent frameworks Unique global exposure through vibrant student exchange programmes. Opportunity to complete the final year of PG in Fasttrack mode. Qualified pool of faculty with 85% of them possessing PhD Industry Tie-ups for placements, projects, and internships.
what_learn: What you will learn? Develop skills to conceive design, implement and operate systems with best engineering practices. Validate engineering models for complex information science & engineering problems through computational measures. Function effectively in a team and as an individual in a multidisciplinary environment. Students will learn the art of writing good research articles through a professional practice course. Students will accomplish holistic development comprehending professional responsibilities. Recognize and appreciate industry culture and importance of societal context in engineering practice.
modules: Modules Network Security Holistic Education Year 1 Research Methodology and IPR Advanced Database systems Advanced Algorithms Advanced Data Science Advanced Algorithms Lab Advanced Database systems Lab Audit Course 1 & 2 Data and Web analytics Advanced Digital Image Processing Network Security Lab Professional Practice-1 & 2 Data and Web analytics Lab Dissertation Phase-1 Internships Year 2 Big Data Analytics
career: Career prospects M. Tech in CSE graduates can work as security architects. Their involvement is crucial in the process of designing security systems, identifying weaknesses, putting security measures in place, and safeguarding networks and sensitive data. M. Tech in CSE graduates can work as data science researchers  in academia or research institutions, advancing data science technologies and applications. Developing intelligent models and algorithms with the ability to make decisions and solve complex issues is known as heuristic programming. Strong heuristic programming skills enable M.Tech in CSE graduates to pursue careers as machine learning engineers, AI researchers, or algorithm designers. Their capabilities are highly valued in robotics, autonomous systems, natural language processing, and optimization. M. Tech in CSE graduates can work as software engineers. Professionals in the IT sector who are highly paid and regarded are software engineers.
